Class ApplicationVMManagementConnector

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ApplicationVMManagementConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements ApplicationVMManagementI
    The class ApplicationVMManagementConnector implements a connector for ports exchanging through the interface ApplicationVMManagementI.
